public class CreateEventDialogFragment extends androidx.fragment.app.DialogFragment
Dialog fragment used for creating events by the Organizer.

    • validPeriod

      protected boolean validPeriod(String start, String end)
      Validates whether the start date is before the end date
      Parameters:
      start - date that should be first in the period
      end - date that should be later in the period
      Returns:
      True if the period is valid, false otherwise

    • validDates

      protected boolean validDates(String regStart, String regEnd, String eventStart, String eventEnd)
      Validates that registration start precedes registration end precedes event start precedes event end
      Parameters:
      regStart - beginning of registration period
      regEnd - end of registration period
      eventStart - beginning of event period
      eventEnd - end of event period
      Returns:
      true if the dates are valid, false with a descriptive Toast explaining the error otherwise
